text: Stevo Pendarovski (; born 3 April 1963) is a Macedonian politician. He was serving as the President of North Macedonia from 12 May 2019 until 12 May 2024.Pendarovski sworn in as new North Macedonia presidentPendarovski sworn in as new North Macedonia presidentNorth Macedonia's new president Stevo Pendarovski takes officePendarovski sworn in as new North Macedonia president ==References== Category:1963 births Category:Living people Category:Current national leaders Category:Presidents of North Macedonia
title: Stevo Pendarovski
